nodes.text: Irizon Fawx was a humanoid male soldier in the Republic Army who served on the planet Quesh during the Galactic War. He worked as a merchant at the Republic Operational Headquarters.

Irizon appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Medium Armor Vendor for Republic players on Quesh. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Irizon was removed from the game along with the rest of the Medium Armor Vendors. His position is also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a game guide released by Prima Games, which labeled him as "Irizon Fawx."
